Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as an attack on freedom of speech, a fundamental right.
The government lacks the objectivity and capability to discern truth from falsehood.
The proposed law could cause harm by censoring potentially truthful information.
The example of COVID-19's origin shows how what was once considered misinformation can later be validated.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is a fundamental right of every Australian.
